description: This HTML file serves as the user interface for a database viewer application. It provides structures for viewing databases and their tables, allows users to refresh the database connections, and handle various UI states like loading, errors, and empty states.

classes.name: DatabaseViewer
classes.description: The main structure for the Database Viewer UI, handling the display and interaction of database and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases from the server.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the tables for a selected database and loads the table data.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays all tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table, showing the records to the user.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders a data table in the UI based on the provided data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates the appropriate table cell content based on the value provided.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles the display of full content for an expandable table cell.
